# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Library                                                  | Version | Supported          |
|----------------------------------------------------------|---------|--------------------|
| [Rust](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust)                | 1.81.0  | :heavy_check_mark: |
| [Shuttle Runtime](https://github.com/shuttle-hq/shuttle) | 0.48.0  | :heavy_check_mark: |
